reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Turmeric Vitamin C Clay Mask - A Refreshing Spa Experience for Your Skin
reviews.reviewText: I recently incorporated the Turmeric Vitamin C Clay Mask into my skincare routine, and I can't help but sing its praises. This facial mask has proven to be a refreshing spa-like experience for my skin, and here's why I think it's an excellent addition to any skincare regimen:**1. Natural Ingredients:** The mask's use of turmeric and vitamin C provides a powerful combination of natural ingredients that are known for their skincare benefits. Turmeric is renowned for its anti-inflammatory and brightening properties, while vitamin C helps even out skin tone and promote a healthy complexion.**2. Gentle Exfoliation:** The clay mask offers gentle exfoliation, helping to remove dead skin cells and unclog pores. After using it, my skin feels smoother and looks revitalized.**3. Skin Radiance:** The combination of turmeric and vitamin C works wonders for brightening the skin. My complexion appears more radiant and refreshed after each use, which is especially welcome on tired or dull skin days.**4. Soothing Sensation:** The mask has a soothing and cooling effect when applied. It's a relaxing treat for the skin, and I find it particularly enjoyable after a long day.**5. Easy Application:** Applying the mask is straightforward, and it spreads evenly across the skin. I appreciate that it doesn't require a lot of time or effort to use, making it a convenient addition to my skincare routine.**6. Versatile Skin Types:** This mask seems to work well for various skin types. Whether you have oily, dry, or sensitive skin, it offers a balanced approach to skincare without causing irritation.**7. Well-Priced:** Considering the quality and the results it delivers, the Turmeric Vitamin C Clay Mask is reasonably priced. It's an affordable way to pamper your skin without breaking the bank.**8. Packaging and Scent:** The mask comes in a convenient, easy-to-squeeze tube, and the scent is pleasant without being overwhelming. It adds to the overall spa-like experience.In conclusion, the Turmeric Vitamin C Clay Mask has become a favorite in my skincare routine. Its natural ingredients, gentle exfoliation, and skin-brightening properties make it a refreshing treat for my skin. If you're looking to revive your complexion and indulge in some self-care, I highly recommend giving this facial mask a try. It's an affordable way to achieve that spa-like glow from the comfort of your own home. Your skin will thank you for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beyond my expectations
reviews.reviewText: First off, I LOVE the smell.. It's a hint of citrus that at first you're like, hmm, where is that coming from. The application worth the brush is like laying on melted butter. I use it 2x's a week, it says up to 3, and the rinse off just leaves me so absolutely soft and smooth. After my 3wks of use, ABSOLUTELY didn't even think about if it made a difference until my husband said, your face looks so much brighter babe and kinda, glowing all the time.. This is the only thing I added to my routine in the last 3mths so yes, IT WORKS!! I am absolutely stuck on this mask and will continue to use only this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic deal! I purchased it primarily due to the impressive ingredient list and my desire for a face mask to enhance my skin. Initially, I was a bit apprehensive after reading a review mentioning skin irritation, but I decided to give it a try, and I'm delighted to report that I experienced no such issues.The packaging includes a convenient small brush that neatly fits into the box. The product itself is thick, and the jar is generously filled. Contrary to some feedback, I found it easy to apply. To ensure a smooth application, I moisten my face first and wet the brush. After 15-20 minutes, I simply rinse with either a rag or paper towel.The results are good – my skin feels not only clean but also remarkably soft to the touch, with a noticeable improvement in brightness. While I haven't witnessed the dramatic results depicted in promotional videos just yet, I believe such outcomes may manifest after consistent use over a month. Despite this, I'm genuinely pleased with the product and confidently recommend it, earning it a solid 4-star rating from me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game Changer for sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: I have very, very sensitive skin and I recently decided to try a turmeric and vitamin c clay mask to address dryness and to diminish the appearance of pock marks on my face... hoping that the mask would not cause breakouts to my sensitive skin. In purchasing this mask, I think that I've found the solution.As the majority of cleansers and soaps on the market cause my skin to breakout, I've been using triple milled soaps for years (lavender or peppermint) to cleanse my face as they don't cause me to breakout but they aren't very moisturizing... leaving my face clean but also dry. Applying moisturizers to my face to address the dryness is a no-no as they cause instant breakouts, so again my face is clean but dry.In my search for a mask that would address the dryness as well as diminish the appearance of the pock marks (while not causing breakouts to my sensitive skin), I decided to try the SHVYOG Turmeric Vitamin C Clay Mask. All I can say is WOW!:* The mask goes on smooth and does not harden and dry up.* When rinsing, this product becomes rich and silky. I was already impressed that the mask applies very smooth but I wasn't expecting the added bonus of the silky texture while rinsing... you're going to love it!* The scent is subtly citrusy... not overpowering at all.* The directions suggest using this mask 1-3 times a week... I've been using it every other night for the past two weeks. I'll make adjustments if need be.* I've noticed a glow to my skin but I believe that it too early to expect to see any change in the appearance of dark spots/pock marks but I am hopeful. I'll update at a later time... keeping my fingers crossed.This mask has been a game changer for me... I can actually say that I have a skin care routine!
